Text:
The movie itself with Eng audio and multisub is only 1.42 GB so skip the other files if you don't need them.

you may want to download the other surrealistic & mad Fellini's classic:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5230170/Fellini_-_Satyricon_(1969)_x264_Ita_Spa_Fra_Ger_multisub
Thanks!  I haven't seen this in a long time.
great, mostly appreciated, btw how to add italian language so that I can watch the movie on my wdtv device, it doesnt recognize it as for example recognize outside subs

Use MPC (    http://cccp-project.net/  ) to automatically recognize & play
the external Audio tracks or mux the external Audio Audio in MKV with  mkvmerge 
(    http://www.videohelp.com/tools/MKVtoolnix  ) if you wish to use other player.
thanks so much for the opportunity to view all these films again!
